snippet.title: Gold Rush short play (Apple II - Sentient Software)
snippet.description:
Gold Rush (https://www.mobygames.com/game/gold-rush__) was an action game published by Sentient Software in 1982 for the Apple ][. The game uses wide track copy protection from track 1 to track F, in which the full track and half track contain the same data.

PS: The # of lives is stored at $A33 and you can get infinite lives by changing 13EE from CE to AD.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Disk image - 4AM
